overview_of_class: Introduction to classical and scheme theoretic methods of algebraic geometry. Algebraic vector bundles, sheaf cohomology, the Riemann-Roch theorem for curves, and intersection theory.
name: Algebraic Geometry
title: WCAS MATH 483-2-81 Algebraic Geometry
